at.htl.EngineControl

Class ECPParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.htl.EngineControl.ECPParameter

  • public class ECPParameter
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the parameters of the Engine Control Protocol as constants.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Dominik Simon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte C_ACK
      Code for Acknowladge.
      static byte DIRECTION_BACKWARD
      Set the direction of the engines to backward
      static byte DIRECTION_FORWARD
      Set the direction of the engines to forward
      static byte DIRECTION_TURN_ANTICLOCKWISE
      Set the direction of the left engine to backward and the right engine to forward.
      static byte DIRECTION_TURN_CLOCKWISE
      Set the direction of the left engine to forward and the right engine to backward.
      static byte E_BUMPER_BACK_CENTER
      Error-Code for Bumper active in back center
      static byte E_BUMPER_BACK_LEFT
      Error-Code for Bumper active in back left
      static byte E_BUMPER_BACK_RIGHT
      Error-Code for Bumper active in back right
      static byte E_BUMPER_FRONT_CENTER
      Error-Code for Bumper active in front center
      static byte E_BUMPER_FRONT_LEFT
      Error-Code for Bumper active in front left
      static byte E_BUMPER_FRONT_RIGHT
      Error-Code for Bumper active in front right
      static byte E_OVERCURRENT
      Error-Code for Overcurrent.
      static byte E_TRANSMISSION
      Error-Code for Transmission faild.
      static java.lang.String END
      End of the Transmission.
      static java.lang.String START
      Start Parameter of each Transmission
